home.name: home
home.title: FoodBot
home.description: FoodBot 3D printer is an equipment which can make food quickly. It allows you to create your own dream dessert.

basis.title: Basis
basis.description: Different size (0.3mm - 1.2mm) printing heads provided to allow you to choose how delicate the print jobs will be. And the FoodBot 3D printer always print the best. This is sample text.
